title: Weather: Phenomena (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Phenomena subcategory within Weather. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: A tree fell over due to the typhoon.
Typhoons and fronts of rain often bring about cloudbusts in Japan.
cards.romaji: nihon dewa, taif. ya baiu zensen no eiky de sh.ch. g u ni osowarerukoto ga yoku arimasu.
cards.japanese: 日本では、台風や梅雨前線の影響で集中豪雨に襲われることがよくあります。
